abstract.text: Convenience object that provides methods and properties for using a user’s authentication tokens.

inlineContent.text: Once a user is authenticated within an application, the tokens’ lifecycle must be managed to ensure it is properly refreshed as needed, is stored in a secure manner, and can be used to perform requests on behalf of the user. This class provides capabilities to accomplish all these tasks, while ensuring a convenient developer experience.

abstract.text: Protocol that delegates of APIClient instances can conform to.
